description:
Learn how to create quality e-learning content quickly and easily. In fact this Udemy course was created and published in only one week. With the simple but effective techniques that I will show you, you can do the same as well.

Learn about the advantage of creating recorded powerpoint slides. Also learn about other e-learning content strategies including text and images, Udemy Mashups, Software and Online website demonstrations, etc...

Good Pedagogical practices are also demonstrated:

  • Keeping your videos bite-sized
  • Sticking to and emphasising the main points.
  • Preparing a script and narrating clearly.
  • Getting the user's attention.

Finally learn about the hardware and software tools that you need to create quality e-learning content. In this course, I will be demonstrating the use of a MacBook Pro together with a Zoom H1 Handy Recorder.
title: Simple But Effective Ways Of Creating E-Learning Material
